name: A Boy and His Blob
description: When Blobolonia is threatened by an evil Emperor, the blob comes to Earth looking for help. Instead, he finds a young boy. Help the blob dethrone the evil Emperor that's terrorizing Blobolonia and establish a friendship with the blob that will last a lifetime.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7-32Bit or Windows 8-32Bit Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 4600+, 2.4GHz / Intel Pentium D 805 2.66GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512 MB / ATI Radeon HD 4650 1GB or higher | Shader Model 3+ Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7-64Bit or Windows 8-64Bit Processor: AMD Athlon 7850 Dual Core Processor 2.8GHz / Intel Core 2 Duo E7500 2.93 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 1GB / ATI Radeon HD 4650 1GB  | Shader Model 3+ Storage: 3 GB available space
